word: C. L. TAYLOR: I DO NOT BELIEVE YOU CATCH MY POINT. I HAVE A BOY. SUPPOSE I NEGLECT HIM. THEN MUST THE CHURCH GO TO THE EXPENSE OF FITTING UP A NEW BUILDING, TO DO WHAT I CAN DO AT HOME, BUT DO NOT DO? THROUGH MY NEGLECT, MUST THEY BE PUT TO EXTRA EXPENSE TO PROVIDE A TEACHER FOR MY CHILD WHEN I CAN TAKE CARE OF HIM MYSELF?
